partial_orders.reason: Both edits replace multiple assertion statements with a single assertion that checks if 'point_coords' and 'point_labels' are both present or both absent in annotation dictionaries. This is an identical structural substitution pattern - replacing separate assertions with a unified equality check. The edits perform the same before→after transformation on the same type of syntactic construct (assertion statements) and appear to be part of a single refactoring sweep to standardize assertion logic across the codebase.
